item.title: Animations Outline
item.description: All Steps Model Draw handler Tick handler Key handler? Mouse handler? 1. Decide model What will the computer remember in order to draw a scene? the moving parts image or number (usually) Write down type of model: image, number, string. Make an example (used in later testing). 2. Draw handler How will you draw the model on the screen?
